description: The REFERRAL_NOTIF_HIS table holds the notification history information associated with the referral records stored in the REFERRAL table.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral in database, to which this notification history information is linked.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the notification history for the referral. For example, if the referral has two notification events, the first will have a line value of 1, while the second will have a line value of 2.

columns.name: LTR_HX_DOC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the document type generated from this notification event.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Kanta - Standard Referral


Kanta - Referral Feedback


Kanta - Outsource Service Authorization


Kanta - Outsource Service Authorization Annulment


Kanta - Standard Referral Annulment


Kanta - Referral Feedback Annulment


Kanta - Standard Referral Annulment and Deletion


Kanta - Referral Feedback Annulment and Deletion

columns.name: LTR_HX_ROI_ID
columns.description: Stores the release of information record that the document sent is stored on.

columns.name: LTR_HX_PAYER_ID
columns.description: Stores the payer we are sending this notification to.

columns.name: LTR_HX_FAX_OVERRIDE
columns.description: Stores the fax number we sent this notification to.

columns.name: NOTIF_HX_GRP_IDENT
columns.description: A grouper ID shared between multiple rows in the notification history table that relate to the same event.

columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.description: Stores the notification event ID triggered

columns.name: NOTIF_HX_ROUTE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the Routing Method of the notification event record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


In Basket


Fax


Mail


Phone Call


MyChart


Network Printer


Courier Service


Outside Provider Messaging


Print Locally


EDI


Opt Out


E-mail


FHIR


Save to File

columns.name: OWNING_INSTANCE_ID
columns.description: Stores the owning deployment of this notification history line.
